reviews.text: Wow, hamburgers were terrific! Beers were delicious! Service was great! Kat the waitress was a one person show and did a great job despite tremendous odds...
I had an issue with service but called and spoke to a female manager who was very nice and addressed the issue well so I've updated my review accordingly....

My Mom and I went there on a Saturday.. we were the 1st customers in right at 5:)
It just reopened after being closed due to the Pandemic....Our bartender/...
